<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Eye of Apprehension](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2973)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=612" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=709" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 264 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 400 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32))</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You are about to roll Perception for initiative but haven't rolled yet

**Requirement** You are a master in Perception
</row>

</column>

---

This round piece of cymophane's silky inclusion makes it look like a cat's eye. While affixed, it makes you jittery. When you activate it, roll Perception twice and use the higher result.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Eye of Apprehension
requirement: You are a master in Perception
